column3: I agree that it makes sense to show a more detailed error message, but letting exceptions hang out with `raise` is not an acceptable way to show errors to the user IMO. Also, now you're catching the exceptions just to raise them again :rabbit:\n
So it seems to me that you want a `--verbose` option for the script, and the default is to swallow detailed error messages or detailed log messages.\n
please close this ticket or merge #5360, sorry it wasn't an update to this PR\nthat new PR addresses your issue @laanwj\n
You can close this pull request yourself, no?\n
